title: All Ball - Charles Barkley on Why NBA Should Cancel, Last Dance, MJ Relationship, '84 Olympic Tryouts, NCAA vs. G-League, Zion
itunes:title: All Ball - Charles Barkley on Why NBA Should Cancel, Last Dance, MJ Relationship, '84 Olympic Tryouts, NCAA vs. G-League, Zion
description:
In this episode, Doug is joined by all-time NBA and broadcasting legend Charles Barkley for an extended, unfiltered conversation on why he thinks the NBA should cancel the season, the The Last Dance good and bad, if he resents Bobby Knight for cutting him from the 1984 Olympic team, why Dream Team II was a nightmare, why he doesn't believe in the G-League model, and his thoughts on his falling out with MJ. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
